https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9ZLqBhzD0cB5EZRFIFxhY5t0vFT.jpg While on a road trip from a long weekend at the Terlingua cookoff, four lifelong friends decide to veer off road and venture into a small West Texas town known as Marfa. What attracted them to do so? Could it be the strange unexplained ghost lights that Marfa is known for? Destination Marfa
